mapper.select: select CUS_NO, CUS_ID, CUS_EMAIL, CUS_NICK from CUSTOMER where CUS_ID = #{CUS_ID};
select CUS_NO , CUS_ID , CUS_NAME , CAST(CUS_BIRTH AS date) CUS_BIRTH, CUS_TEL , CUS_EMAIL , CUS_GENDER, CUS_NICK from CUSTOMER where CUS_NO = #{CUS_NO};
mapper.update: update CUSTOMER set CUS_NAME = #{CUS_NAME}, CUS_NICK = #{CUS_NICK}, CUS_TEL = #{CUS_TEL}, CUS_EMAIL = #{CUS_EMAIL}, CUS_BIRTH = #{CUS_BIRTH}, CUS_REDATE = DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') where 1 = 1 and CUS_NO = #{CUS_NO};
